original_title: Let’s do it with Coconut Water…
original_body_lines: Yes, everything is skyrocketing, these days, and coconut, too, comes into this category of ‘expensive items.’ However, the benefits of coconut water for hair are plenty, so why not move into action!
Massaging your scalp and hair with coconut water may help stimulate blood circulation, and improve scalp moisture, which can help strengthen the hair follicles and promote hair growth.
Massage your scalp with this coconut water for about five minutes and let it remain on your scalp for 30 minutes. Then wash it off with shampoo and lukewarm water.
You can also mix coconut oil with coconut water to nourish coarse and dry hair.
Lemon can help maintain scalp health and reduce dandruff and scalp acne.
You will need 02 tablespoons of lemon juice, and 1/2 cup of coconut water.
Mix the coconut water and lemon juice and apply this solution to your hair and wait for 20 minutes. Rinse off with lukewarm water.
Honey can help soothe itchy scalp, prevent dandruff, and keep your hair conditioned.
You will need 01 cup of coconut water and 04 tablespoons of honey.

Mix the honey with coconut water to form a thick mixture. Apply this mixture to your scalp and hair and wrap your head with a hot towel to enable the mixture to penetrate deeper into your scalp. Leave it on for about 30 minutes before rinsing off.
Bananas are rich in silicon. This element may help promote natural hair luster and combat hair loss.
Mix the coconut water with the mashed banana to create a smooth mixture and apply to the scalp and hair.
Leave it on for about 30 minutes until it is completely dry, and then wash with tepid water.
